author: Nandita Bose
title: Amazon lawsuit blames Trump for loss of Pentagon cloud contract
description: Amazon.com Inc on Monday accused U.S. President Donald Trump of exerting "improper pressure" and bias that led the Department of Defense to award a lucrative $10 billion cloud contract to rival Microsoft Corp .
content:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Amazon.com Inc (AMZN.O) on Monday accused U.S. President Donald Trump of exerting “improper pressure” and bias that led the Department of Defense to award a lucrative $10 billion cloud contract to rival Microsoft Corp (MSFT.O).

title: Japanese billionaire Maezawa in $9 million 'social experiment' giveaway

content:

description: Legal complaint lists Apple, Google's parent company Alphabet, Dell, Microsoft and Tesla as defendants.
